root.api_para: a:6:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:13:"provider_code";s:5:"value";s:5:"qzone";s:10:"directions";s:26:"平台代码，如：qzone";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 1";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:6:"openid";s:5:"value";s:10:"1707357339";s:10:"directions";s:24:"唯一标识用户身份";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 1";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:8:"nickname";s:5:"value";s:12:"是非亦航";s:10:"directions";s:50:"呢称，注:nickname与realname不能同时为空";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:8:"realname";s:5:"value";s:12:"是非亦航";s:10:"directions";s:6:"姓名";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:5:"email";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:5:"email";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"String";}i:5;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:6:"gender";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:19:"姓别, 1男，0女";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:3:"Int";}}
